featured.text: Google, which already uses prototypes of such cars to ferry its staff along Californian freeways, once put a blind man in a prototype and filmed him being driven off to buy takeaway hamburgers.
I was held up by a traffic jam on the freeway for about an hour.

definition.zh_def: 高速公路，一種供汽車快速通行的道路，通常不允許行人和非機動車輛進入。
definition.en_def: A freeway is a high-capacity road designed for fast-moving vehicles, typically with no intersections or traffic signals.
definition.example: We took the freeway to reach the city faster.
